lead_paragraph: For the second time in two years, Steven Campbell’s two-story home has served as a landing spot for an out-of-control vehicle.
snippet: For the second time in two years, Steven Campbell’s two-story home has served as a landing spot for an out-of-control vehicle....

headline.print_headline: Familiar Guest at a Bronx Home: An Out-of-Control Vehicle
headline.main: Familiar Guest at a Bronx Home: An Out-of-Control Vehicle
headline.seo: Familiar Guest at a Bronx Home - An Out-of-Control Vehicle

abstract: Bronx home that sits on a five-corner intersection serves as a landing spot for an out-of-control vehicle for the second time in two years as livery cab slams through fence, landing in owner Steven Campbell's garage.
